oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcards of Milton Calliham
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: These two picture postcards of Milton Calliham were taken when he was in the Navy before World War I. In the first image, Calliham appears in typical Navy "whites" in the studio portrait and wears the leggings generally reserved for shore duty. In the second photograph, Calliham stands in front of two steerage wheels and holds a Krag Rifle while also wearing a web cartridge belt with bayonet. The Krag Rifle was adopted by the US military in the 1880s.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Calliham, Milton
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
